bugreport.summary: Unable to add a second item via the add_to_cart button
bugreport.Description: When my cart contains one item, I am unable to add a second item via the add_to_cart button on a product page

StepsToReproduce.two: Add any item to the cart

bugreport.expresult: being able to add a second item to the cart
bugreport.actualresult: NOT being able to add a second item to the cart
